casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John David CAMPBELL. No. 487P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 4, 2007. Charlotte Gail Blake, Boone, for Campbell. Garry W. Frank, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of October 2007 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of October 2007."
